acceptOwnership().details: The new owner accepts the ownership transfer.

params.priceFeedAddress: Corresponding Chainlink price feed addresses. Use address(0) to remove support.

params.positionId: ID of the position to update.

depositCollateral(uint256,uint256).details: Transfers tokens and updates position state.

params.positionId: ID of the position to deposit collateral into.
ID of the position to modify.

flashFee(address,uint256).details: The fee to be charged for a given loan.

returns._0: The amount of `token` to be charged for the loan, on top of the returned principal.

flashLoan(address,address,uint256,bytes).details: Assumes zero fee for the flash loan. Expects repayment plus amount before function completes.

params.amountLoan: The amount of stblUSD to loan.
params.data: Arbitrary data to pass to the receiver's `onFlashLoan` callback.
params.loanToken: Must be stblUSD; flash loans are only supported for this token.
params.receiver: The contract implementing `onFlashLoan`, which will receive the funds.

returns.success: Boolean indicating success of flash loan execution.

params.positionId: ID of the position to fetch.

returns._0: Position data including owner, token, collateral, and debt.

params.positionId: ID of the position to evaluate.

returns.totalCollateralValueInUsd: Total collateral value in 1e18 USD units.

params.positionId: ID of the position to evaluate.

returns._0: USD value of the token amount (scaled to 1e18).

params.user: The address of the user whose position IDs are being queried.

returns._0: An array of position IDs owned or created by the user.

params.positionId: ID of the position to liquidate.

maxFlashLoan(address).details: The amount of currency available to be lended.

returns._0: The amount of `token` that can be borrowed.

mintStblUSD(uint256,uint256).details: Reverts if resulting LTV exceeds MAX_LTV.

params.positionId: ID of the position to mint sblUSD from.

params.collateralToken: Address of the collateral token to deposit.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

pendingOwner().details: Returns the address of the pending owner.

params.positionId: ID of the position to redeem from.
ID of the position to update.

renounceOwnership().details: Intentionally disabled to retain upgradeability and collateral support management.

transferOwnership(address).details: Starts the ownership transfer of the contract to a new account. Replaces the pending transfer if there is one. Can only be called by the current owner. Setting `newOwner` to the zero address is allowed; this can be used to cancel an initiated ownership transfer.

MAX_LTV().notice: Maximum allowed LTV for minting stblUSD (90% in 1e18 precision)

addSupportedCollateralTokens(address[],a.notice: Adds or removes support for collateral tokens.

burnStblUSD(uint256,uint256).notice: Burns stblUSD from sender and updates the position state.

depositCollateral(uint256,uint256).notice: Deposits supported collateral into a position.

depositCollateralAndMintStblUSD(uint256,.notice: Deposits collateral and mints stblUSD in a single transaction.

flashLoan(address,address,uint256,bytes).notice: Initiates a flash loan in stblUSD to the specified receiver.

getPosition(uint256).notice: Returns the current Position struct for a given position ID.

getPositionCollateralValue(uint256).notice: Returns the total collateral value (in USD) for a position.

getPositionLTV(uint256).notice: Returns the current Loan-to-Value (LTV) ratio of a position.

getStblUSD().notice: Returns the address of the stblUSD token

getTokenUsdValue(address,uint256).notice: Converts a token amount into its USD equivalent using Chainlink.

getUserPositionIds(address).notice: Returns an array of position IDs associated with a given user.

liquidate(uint256).notice: Liquidates an under-collateralized position and claims the collateral.

mintStblUSD(uint256,uint256).notice: Mints stblUSD against a position's deposited collateral.

openPosition(address,uint256,uint256).notice: Opens a new position with specified collateral and mints i_stblUSD.

redeemCollateralAndBurnStblUSD(uint256,u.notice: Burns stblUSD and redeems corresponding collateral in one transaction.

renounceOwnership().notice: Overrides renounceOwnership to prevent ownership renunciation.
